scripts.build: cd ../web-app && npm install && npm run build && cd ../desktop-app && npm install && rimraf builder dist && node -e "require('fs-extra').copySync('../web-app/dist', 'builder')" && electron-builder
scripts.optionalbuild: cd ../web-app && npm install && npm run build && cd ../desktop-app && npm install && (if exist builder rmdir /s /q builder) && (if exist dist rmdir /s /q dist) && mkdir builder && xcopy /e /i /y "../web-app/dist\*" "builder\" && electron-builder
scripts.update: ncu -u && rimraf node_modules package-lock.json && npm install
scripts.optionalupdate: ncu -u && (if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules) && (if exist package-lock.json del /f /q package-lock.json) && npm install
